# Add subdirectories
add_subdirectory(di)
add_subdirectory(sml)
add_subdirectory(ut)

# Add interface target
add_library(boost_ext INTERFACE)
# Add libraries to the compiled target
target_link_libraries(boost_ext
    INTERFACE
        boost-di
        boost-sml
        boost-ut
)
